title: (x) Ralph Lauren modern serif - ITC Fenice {Bart Hakvoort}
content:
Anyone know what font this is, or if it's a custom...a similar one? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120419082727im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rl_6072.jpg)
author: staybeautiful

comments.content:
Hi staybeautiful! ;-)

Funny that you are looking for this font at the moment. It was yesterday when I asked myself the same question. Think I have started a thread with this theme also..  
Definitely recently someone has made some changes in this logo so that it really looks good now!  
And I wondered who could it be..  
The new ad pages of Lauren now are one of the best.  
I don’t believe that Fenice - at least using it as it is as a standard font - brings you any nearer.

I am looking forward to see if there is anyone joining in here with new information about the making of this logotype.

Good luck  
Stefan
